### Master thesis 
8 months, grandted from Erasmus+ program 

Supervisors: Pr: M. Campioli and Dr: Jozica Gricar 
Centre of Excellence Plants and Ecosystems [(PLECO)](https://www.uantwerpen.be/en/research-groups/pleco/), Antwerp, Belgium and at the [Slovenian foresty institut](https://www.gozdis.si/en/), Ljubljana, Slovenia   

My master thesis was part of the ERC project [LEAF-FALL](https://www.uantwerpen.be/en/research-groups/pleco/research/research-projects/erc-grants/erc-grant-leaf-fall/).I sutdied the inter-individual variability in spring phenology of temperate deciduous trees in relation to tree characteristics and previous year autumn phenology, and publised 2 papers abour it: Marchand et al 2020 and Marchand et al 2021b.
